metadata.title: CVE-2023-40551 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the MZ binary format in Shim. An out-of-bounds read mayoccur, leading to a crash or possible exposure of sensitive data during thesystem's boot phase.

criterions.comment: secureboot-db package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
shim-signed: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'install media keys will never be revoked').
shim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'install media keys will never be revoked').
